meanings.definition: The transfer or spread of something to an unintended recipient or area.
meanings.sent1: The spillovers from the party decorations made the whole room colorful.
meanings.sent2: The spillovers of the paint reached the floor, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent3: The spillovers of the glitter resulted in a sparkling surprise for the guests.
meanings.sent4: The spillovers of kindness in the community created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The spillovers of laughter filled the room with joy and happiness.

meanings.definition: The unintended consequences or effects of an action or event.
meanings.sent1: The economic spillovers of the decision affected many businesses in the area.
meanings.sent2: The spillovers of the argument led to tension among the group.
meanings.sent3: The spillovers of the prank caused laughter throughout the office.
meanings.sent4: The spillovers of the storm left a trail of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The spillovers of the misunderstanding resulted in confusion among the team members.
